editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Baptismal ritual, Mäṣǝḥäfä Kərsətəna, መጽሐፈ፡ ክርስትና፡. Sylvain Grébaut, “Ordre du Baptême et de la Confirmation dans l’Église Éthiopienne,” ROC 26 (19287–8) 105–89; Ernst Trumpp, “Das Taufebuch der aethiopischen Kircher: Aethiopisch und Deutsch,” Abhandlungen der philosophisch.-philologischen Classe der Königlichen Bayerischen Akademie der Wissenschaften 14.111 (1878) 147–83; EMML 1106; Or. 11802. StrBL 71. F-25v: Litany, Liṭon, ሊጦን፡, for Monday (24r), Tuesday (24v) and evening (25r). mentions the scribe, ወልደ አማኑኤል. : record: mentions the owner who ordered the book, ወልደ ማርያም, his wife, ተስፋ ማርያም, and the scribe, ወልደ አማኑኢል. -68v: continuation of Baptismal Ritual. : record: mentions "our king, ኃይለ ሥላሴ, and Our Father, ባስልዮስ. Ff 68v-74r: Mystagogia, Tǝmhǝrtä Ḫǝbu‘at, ትምህርተ፡ ኅቡዓት፡. HTexte 48–72; Textes 40–52; Me‘erāf I 215–7; MG 9ff,

origin.origDate: 1956-1970 (ff. 32r and passim mentions our Father Basilyos, Patriarch 1956-1970).

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
